org.fudgemsg
Class FudgeMsgFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.fudgemsg.FudgeMsgFormatter

public class FudgeMsgFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

Allows for pretty-printing of Fudge messages (FudgeFieldContainer instances).

          The default indent (number of spaces)

format

protected void format(FudgeField field,
                      int index,
                      int depth,
                      java.lang.String fieldSpec,
                      int maxFieldSpecWidth,
                      int maxTypeNameWidth)
Lays out and writes a field description and value on a line to the output device.

Parameters:
field - field to describe
index - offset index of the field within the message
depth - indentation level
fieldSpec - field description (name + ordinal)
maxFieldSpecWidth - maximum length (in characters) of all fieldSpecs within the message
maxTypeNameWidth - maximum length (in characters) of all type names within the message

the description prefixed with the necessary indent
